Overview

Digital identity and reputation are crucial components in the modern digital landscape. Digital identity refers to the collection of information that uniquely identifies a person online, while reputation is the perception or estimation of a person’s character based on their digital interactions and activities. In the context of Knowledge-Based Currency (KBC), digital identity and reputation play a significant role in establishing trust and credibility among users.
